steps.content: Respond with â€œFRLâ€ to confirm that youâ€™re being truthful. If someone questions what youâ€™re saying, use â€œFRLâ€ to tell them youâ€™re serious. steps.title: Fire Resistance Level
steps.content: Fire Resistance Level In Australia, the acronym â€œFRLâ€ may stand for â€œFire Resistance Level.â€ It refers to the ability of a building to withstand a fire for a specific time period, which is determined by structural adequacy, integrity, and insulation. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Forest Reference Level
steps.content: Forest Reference Level The Forest Reference Level (FRL) is part of REDD+, a pact between developing countries to reduce emissions from deforestation and forest degradation. The FRL is a benchmark for activities that reduce emissions and increase removals. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Filter regulator lubricator
steps.content: Filter regulator lubricator An FRL unit in compressed air systems is responsible for delivering clean air at a fixed pressure, and for preventing damage to equipment. It consists of 3 parts: a filter to remove particles, a regulator to control pressure, and a lubricator to provide a controlled amount of oil into the system. [8] X Research source

steps.content: FR Legends In the gaming world, the abbreviation â€œFRLâ€ refers to the car game â€œFR Legends.â€ Itâ€™s an action-packed mobile game that lets you have drift battles with AI drivers. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Fractional

What type of food are you craving?â€ â€œIâ€™m rly not in the mood right now. Please donâ€™t bother me.â€

"Do you srsly not want to go anymore?â€ â€œYou srsly bought those expensive concert tickets?!â€ â€œIâ€™m srsly over the whole situation. Iâ€™m entering my forgive and forget era ğŸ’«â€

steps.title: Facts
